title: Brides Of Destruction - Here Come The Brides Demos
description:
Another Nikki Sixx side project, this time teaming with Tracii Guns to form *Brides Of Destruction* and put out an album called "Here Come The Brides".  After touring behind this album, Nikki would leave to reform Motley Crue.  The Brides would carry on with a new bassist, but disband after one more album (Runaway Brides).  These are the demos from the "Here Come The Brides" sessions.  Enjoy!

Tracklist:
01 - I Don't Care
02 - 2 x Dead (Goin Out)
03 - Shut The Fuck Up
04 - Life
05 - Only Get So Far
06 - My Revolution
07 - I've Got A Gun
08 - Brace Yourself
09 - Natural Born Killer
10 - Seven Deadly Sins
11 - Here Comes The Summer

Feel free to share this torrent, but please include the info file when sharing.
